thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 16 of 948
thread.title: Nikolaj

author: Nikolaj
title: Nikolaj
text: I often buy games from Bundle Stars and I've (almost) only got positive things to say about the store. They offer great games to very reasonable prices and their bundles are straight up bargains. They have a nice customer service and the site in general is easy to use. The only negative things I can find is that some of the games they offer won't work/register in certain regions (but they explicitly tell you if that's the case on the product page) and that their assortment of games is limited (compared to Steam or Kinguin for example).
